# 要连接到构建目标的源文件；
TARGET_SOURCES(
    ${PROJECT_NAME}
    PRIVATE
    #Begin target source
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/mui_u8g2.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/mui_u8g2.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/mui.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/u8g2_arc.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/u8g2_bitmap.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/u8g2_box.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/u8g2_buffer.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/u8g2_button.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/u8g2_circle.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/u8g2_cleardisplay.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/u8g2_d_memory.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/u8g2_d_setup.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/u8g2_font.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/u8g2_fonts.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/u8g2_hvline.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/u8g2_input_value.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/u8g2_intersection.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/u8g2_kerning.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/u8g2_line.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/u8g2_ll_hvline.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/u8g2_message.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/u8g2_polygon.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/u8g2_selection_list.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/u8g2_setup.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/u8log_u8g2.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/u8log_u8x8.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/u8log.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/u8x8_8x8.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/u8x8_byte.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/u8x8_cad.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/u8x8_capture.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/u8x8_d_ssd1327.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/u8x8_d_ssd1306_128x64_noname.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/u8x8_d_stdio.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/u8x8_debounce.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/u8x8_display.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/u8x8_fonts.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/u8x8_gpio.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/u8x8_input_value.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/u8x8_message.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/u8x8_selection_list.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/u8x8_setup.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/u8x8_string.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/u8x8_u8toa.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/u8x8_u16toa.c
    #end target sorurce
)

# 将模块头文件路径添加到目标；
TARGET_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(${PROJECT_NAME} 
    PUBLIC 
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}
)
